hadith.text: It was narrated from Jabir bin Abdullah that when the Messenger of Allah came to Maqam Ibrahim he recited:"And take you the Maqam (place) of Ihrahim as a place of prayer." Then he prayed two Rakahs reciting the Opening of the Book (Al-Fatihah) said: "Say: O you disbelievers" and "Say: He is Allah, (the) One." Then he went back to the Corner and touched it, then he went out to As-Safa
